## Set-Up 

```{r}
# If packages have not downloaded before
#install.packages("tidyverse")
#install.packages("tidyquant")
#install.packages("ggthemes")
library(tidyverse)
library(tidyquant)
library(ggthemes)
```

## Getting Prices

```{r}
bros <- tq_get("BROS", get = "stock.prices")
sbux <- tq_get("SBUX", get = "stock.prices", from = "2021-09-15")
```


## Graphing 

```{r}
bros <- bros |>
  mutate(company = "Dutch Bros")

sbux <- sbux |>
  mutate(company = "Starbucks")

prices <- bind_rows(bros, sbux)

ggplot(prices,
       mapping = aes(x = date, y = close, color = company)) +
  geom_line(linewidth = 1) +
  labs(
    title = "Starbucks v. Dutch Bros Price",
    x = "Date",
    y = "Price $"
  ) + theme_economist_white()
```
